title: fed lamb shoulder with a saffron sauce and cumin roast potatoes
description: Feed a party with these skewers of spicy marinated lamb shoulder, served with amazing spiced roast potatoes and a rich cream sauce.
ingredients: 2 lamb shoulders, about 1.5kg/3lb 5oz each, trimmed of any surface fat
3 onions, sliced and fried until crisp
1kg/2lb 4oz Maris Piper or King Edward potatoes, peeled and cut into 5cm/2in pieces
1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander, plus extra for garnish
